snippet: With a grand slam and five runs batted in, Chris Davis helped the Orioles win their home opener against the Minnesota Twins.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Baltimore Orioles beat Minnesota Twins, 9-5; Orioles first baseman Chris Davis extends his torrid start with grand slam and five runs batted in; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: With a grand slam and five runs batted in, Chris Davis helped the Orioles win their home opener against the Minnesota Twins.

headline.seo: Chris Davis Homers in Fourth Straight Game to Help Orioles Top Twins
headline.main: Davis Homers Again as Orioles Top Twins
headline.print_headline: Davis Homers Again As Orioles Top Twins
